title: Fibonacci Series

explanation.approach: Each number is sum of previous two.
steps: Each next = sum of previous two

title: Pascal's Triangle Row
description: Generate nth row of Pascal's triangle.

title: Catalan Number

explanation.approach: Dynamic programming: C(n) = sum of C(i) * C(n-1-i).
steps: Sum all splits for larger n

title: nCr Calculation
description: Calculate binomial coefficient n choose r.

title: Power Set Size
description: Calculate number of subsets of n elements.

title: Count Set Bits 1 to N
description: Count total set bits in all numbers from 1 to n.

explanation.approach: Count bits in each number and sum.
explanation.complexity: Time: O(n log n), Space: O(1)

title: Sum of Multiples
description: Sum all multiples of 3 or 5 below n.

explanation.approach: Check each number for divisibility by 3 or 5.

title: Digital Root
description: Find single-digit sum of all digits (repeated).

steps: Keep summing digits until single digit

title: Trailing Zeros in Factorial
description: Count trailing zeros in n factorial.

title: Smallest Prime Factor
description: Find smallest prime factor for each number 0 to n.

explanation.complexity: Time: O(n log log n), Space: O(n)
